Uses of Package
com.dhemery.core

  • Packages that use com.dhemery.core 
    Package Description
    com.dhemery.configuring
    Translate configuration options to and from various representations.
    com.dhemery.core
    Construct objects, evaluate objects, and perform actions.
    com.dhemery.expressing
    Composable methods to evaluate boolean expressions, make assertions, wait for conditions, and take action when preconditions are met.
    com.dhemery.os
    Run operating system commands.
    com.dhemery.osx
    Run and interact with OS X commands and applications.
    com.dhemery.polling
    Evaluate conditions repeatedly.
    com.dhemery.polling.events
    Events related to polling.
    com.dhemery.strings
    Operate on strings and translate them to other types.
  • Classes in com.dhemery.core used by com.dhemery.configuring 
    Class and Description
    Builder
    Builds an object of type T.
    Feature
    Retrieves the value of a feature for a subject.
    Named
    An object that describes itself by a fixed name.
    StringDictionary
    A set of defined terms.
    UnaryOperator
    An operator that operates on a single value, and produces a value of the same type.

    Class and Description
    Action
    An action that acts on a subject.
    Builder
    Builds an object of type T.
    Condition
    A condition that may be satisfied or dissatisfied.
    Expression 
    Feature
    Retrieves the value of a feature for a subject.
    Lazy
    A lazy supplier that caches the first value it supplies, and always yields the cached value.
    LazyStream
    A lazy stream over the objects supplied by an iterable source.
    MaybePresent
    An object that may be present.
    MaybeVisible
    An object that may be visible.
    Named
    An object that describes itself by a fixed name.
    NamedFeature
    A feature described by a fixed name.
    NullSafeUnaryOperator
    An operator that allows subclasses to operate on the operand without checking for null.
    Repeat
    Repeats an action until a condition is satisfied.
    Sampler
    Samples a variable and retains the sample.
    Supplier
    Supplies a value of type T.
    UnaryOperator
    An operator that operates on a single value, and produces a value of the same type.
    Until
    Repeats an action until a condition is satisfied.
